title: Microbes and Fresh Water
content:
Are we going to lose the battle with microbes? <!--more--> The smart diet = smart children News about broccoli Can Omega 3 help ADHD?
Drought, fracking, coal, nukes, and our fresh water supply America is becoming a 3rd world country Guest: Health official biases against vaccine safety,  the adverse effects of aluminum adjuvant, evidence of serious neurotoxic effects from Gardasil Dr Lucija Tomljenovic is an early career postdoctoral fellow.
She received her PhD in Biochemistry, from the Comparative Genomics Centre at James Cook University in Townsville, Australia.
In 2010, she joined the Neural Dynamics Research Group at the University of British Columbia to work on with renowned neuroscientist Prof.
Christopher Shaw’s and is currently researching the neurotoxic effects of aluminum vaccine adjuvants.
Lucija is also an Associate Editor of the Journal of Alzheimer’s Disease.   She and her colleagues are among the few courageous university researchers undertaking independent and honest experiments into vaccines
